name: Infrastructure Projects
description: Importer and Exporter of Fire Retardant
overview:
Established in the year 2003, we, “Infrastructure Projects & Mercantile”, are engaged in Distributing, Importing and Exporting a vast array of Fire Retardant & Safety and Allied Security Product. Our range of products encompasses Diving Equipment, Marine Equipment, Fire Retardant Floor and Deck Protection, Adhesive and Sealant for Marine Application, Security System, Assault Line, Thigh Pouch, Cyalume Stick and Ceramic Knife. Also, we offer Digital Camera & SD Memory Card 2GB, Disposable Glove.

Our Team: Sourcing agents Quality controllers Warehousing & packaging experts Sales & marketing executives

Quality Standards Delivered: Maintaining high quality standards in products & policies is of utmost importance for our firm. The products offered by us are sourced from most trusted and reliable vendors of market who make use of high quality material in the manufacturing process.

Vendor Base: Owing to the tremendous support of our vendors, we have been able to grow rapidly in the market and build a position of repute. The vendors with whom we are associated make use of high-grade material in the manufacturing process. All our sourced products are in compliance with international quality standards. These vendors are selected by a team of sourcing agents, which conducts variegated market surveys and further analyzes the results.

Warehousing and Packaging: We have established a massive warehouse in our premises, which is meant to cater to the bulk scale storage of the products. The warehouse is designed in accordance with the advice given by leading architects of the industry. It is divided into sections to ensure that the products are stored in a categorized manner.
